```{r}
#===============================================================================
# Libraries and functions
#===============================================================================

library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
`%notin%` <- Negate(`%in%`)

#===============================================================================
# Read in data
#===============================================================================

# Read in Data
list_of_files <- list.files("../Data/processed_odds", full.names = TRUE)

# Read in all data
all_odds <- 
  list_of_files |> 
  map_dfr(read_rds)
```

# Lines

```{r}
all_odds |> 
  arrange(match, player_name, market_name, line, desc(over_price)) |> 
    filter(!is.na(under_price))
```
